A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 359 'fresh' reviews? It's hard to believe that 359 checks weren't written by the Disney corporation. It's probably time to create a Tomatometer for each of these critics. After reading and rereading the 'Critics Consensus' above I can only retort in Luke Skywalker's own words: 'Amazing. Every word of what you just said was wrong.'
